preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 70 g of boron powder. 
 2. Measure out 90 g of cobalt powder. 
 3. Measure out 20 g of silicon powder. 
 4. Measure out 30 g of samarium powder. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture thoroughly for 15 minutes to ensure homogeneity.
